description:
Sharpay describes itself as a project that can be scaled to reward users with cryptocurrencies/tokens. It offers share buttons with blockchain rewards. It envisages itself to be a social media marketing (SMM) tool with international patent priority for 152 countries.
Websites install Sharpay share buttons to allow users to share content on their social networks. Sharpay buttons were designed with the goal of improving websites’ KPIs (e.g. increasing traffic, user registration, sales). Users can earn cryptocurrencies for sharing content. The Sharpay utility token (S) is traded on mutliple cryptocurrency exchanges. For more information, please visit https://sharpay.io.
name: Sharpay
